meanings.definition: A suffix used in the names of proteins.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied a new pro-tein in the lab.
meanings.sent2: She learned about different types of pro-tein in biology class.
meanings.sent3: The pro-tein walked into a bar and ordered a drink.
meanings.sent4: The pro-tein of the team, she held everyone together.
meanings.sent5: The pro-tein of kindness was evident in her actions.

meanings.definition: A suffix used in the names of certain chemical compounds.
meanings.sent1: The lab assistant mixed the com-tein with the solution.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often work with different types of com-tein in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The com-tein decided to throw a party for all the other compounds.
meanings.sent4: The com-tein of reactions, it sparked a chain of events.
meanings.sent5: The com-tein of change was evident in the experiment results.

meanings.definition: A suffix used in the names of certain amino acids.
meanings.sent1: The body needs essential ami-tein to function properly.
meanings.sent2: Nutritionists emphasize the importance of various ami-tein in a balanced diet.
meanings.sent3: The ami-tein challenged the other acids to a race.
meanings.sent4: The ami-tein of strength, it provided energy for the workout.
meanings.sent5: The ami-tein of health was crucial for her recovery.
